metadata.title: CVE-2021-39881 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In all versions of GitLab CE/EE since version 7.7, the application may leta malicious user create an OAuth client application with arbitrary scopenames which may allow the malicious user to trick unsuspecting users toauthorize the malicious client application using the spoofed scope name anddescription.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
